title: Without Rival: Mathieu van der Poel Dominates Tour of Flanders with Magnus Sheffield in top-10
content:
The world champion joins the elite club of three-time winners at the Belgian monument, Matthews relegated off podium in controversial call.

Read the full article at Without Rival: Mathieu van der Poel Dominates Tour of Flanders with Magnus Sheffield in top-10 on Velo.
author: ahood
